name: Final Fantasy VII Mako Reactor
description:
Preview of Mako Reactor in Starcraft 2.

1. [http://twitpic.com/210609/full](</linkout?remoteUrl=http%253a%252f%252ftwitpic.com%252f210609%252ffull>)

4. [http://twitpic.com/2107wi/full](</linkout?remoteUrl=http%253a%252f%252ftwitpic.com%252f2107wi%252ffull>)



**This map is semicomplete: **\- Added WASD keyboard controls - The Reator Mako is complete. - Changed the "giant" edifice for a reactor "giant". - There's no battle system and dialogue. - This map is now free.

**Things to do: **\- Added Menu - Added Battle System - Added dialogue/Scenes - Delete character selection and mouse. - Add guide points (very similar in FF7). - Add sound effects, may be implemented the same effects of FF7. - Obviously, I will have to import custom models on the map, not cool to see Cloud in the form of Prottos.

Sorry for my bad english :(

By Saged.
